reviewText: LOVE this movie!!! I wish it had subtitles so my non-Spanish speaking friend can see it without me having to narrate the story for them.
This was as described with English subtitles.
It was a wonderful movie both my parents enjoyed it.  If there were other movies like this we would order them.
The information on this DVD says English Subtitles . But there was no Subtitles on my copy. I am disappointed as I do not speak spanish.

To have it all and loose it all in gambling is payback for gaining everything the same way.  Lucha Villa plays the unhappy woman who misses the action of the palenque. Fast pacing story with plenty of action.
This is a great movie! Ignacio Lopez Tarso perfoms tremendously! I highly recomend it.

I enjoy old Mexican movies and this is up there with the best. Ignacio Tarzo puts in a strong perfomance as the little puebla's
cryer. This movie has drama, story and excellent singing by ranchera queen, Lucha Villa. A beautiful and warm movie.
